document.full_text: first-quarter net income was $3.2 billion, or $1.77 a share, one of g.m.'s best performances since the early 2000s. quarterly revenue rose nearly 15 percent to $36.2 billion.
document.title: g.m. reports earnings tripled in first quarter, as revenue jumped 15%
lines_and_colors: first-quarter net income was $3.2 billion, or $1.77 a share, one of g.m.'s best performances since the early 2000s. quarterly revenue rose nearly 15 percent to $36.2 billion.
